sense.name: condition of watchfulness.
sense.examples: Bombers were put on alert to danger. We were all on alert that evening.

sense.name: warning or admonition
sense.commentary: ALERT[+event] Note: Warning is NOT automatic signal.
sense.examples: She gave me a verbal alert. Many alerts came in of fire danger.

sense.name: warning, typically a siren.
sense.examples: The alarms provided us all with an alert. The house alarm gives adequate alert of intruders.
